biography:
Richard Dawson Kiel (born September 13, 1939) was an American actor best known for his role as the steel-toothed Jaws in the James Bond movies The Spy Who Loved Me (1977) and Moonraker (1979) as well as the video game Everything or Nothing, and Mr. Larson in Happy Gilmore. He was 7 feet 1.5Â  inches (2.18 m) tall in his prime but now due to injury and age, he is slightly under 7 feet tall.
